name: polymask.js
tagline: jQuery Plugin for Responsive Polygon Masking and Clipping of HTML elements
body: ### Welcome to jQuery polyMask Plugin This jQuery plugin makes polygon clipping for your HTML elements easy. It handles crossbrowser compatibility. And it is responsive! ### Demo Click here for demo ### How To Use Add the plugin to the head or your document `
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
